original_text: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.
korean_text: 그들이 말하되 그 악한 자들을 진멸하고 포도원은 제 때에 열매를 바칠 만한 다른 농부들에게 세로 줄지니이다

sentences.original_text: He will miserably destroy those wicked men
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 악한 그들을 비참하게 멸망시킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 포도원을 다른 농부들에게 빌려줄 것이라

sentences.original_text: which shall render him the fruits in their seasons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 제 때에 열매를 바칠 것이라
